title: Login Timeout
description: Users in EU region are reporting that the login screen spins for 60 seconds before failing with a timeout. Started after the latest CDN change.

title: Unexpected Charge
description: Customer on the starter plan was billed twice for the same invoice (INV-99812). Needs refund and confirmation the duplicate charge won't reoccur.

title: Upload Crash
description: Desktop app (v2.3.1) crashes whenever a PDF larger than 25MB is uploaded. Stack trace references ImageMagick.

title: Dark Mode Contrast
description: Feedback from accessibility audit: dark mode text color does not meet WCAG AA on headings. Need design update.

title: Reset Email Delay
description: Password reset emails arrive 45 minutes late. SES dashboard shows queue build-up for the reset template only.

title: Slow Dashboard Widgets
description: Revenue widget loads forever while other widgets finish. Network tab shows a 504 from /api/revenue-stats.

title: CSV Export Missing Columns
description: Operations need the ‘region’ and ‘account_manager’ columns included in the account export. Currently missing.

title: Notifications Disabled
description: All webhook notifications to Zapier stopped around 3am UTC. No payloads recorded since then.

title: Account Access Locked
description: VIP client locked out after traveling; IP change triggered fraud rules. Need manual unlock plus allowlisting.

title: Slack Integration Failure
description: Setting up the Slack integration returns `invalid_oauth_state`. Happens in prod, not staging.

title: Corrupted Data Export
description: Monthly KPI export downloaded from /reports returns an unreadable XLSX (Excel says file format mismatch).

title: High Contrast Mode
description: Visually impaired user cannot see selected state in high contrast mode; focus ring is same color as background.

title: API Limit Reached
description: Partner integration hits 429 after only 300 calls/hour despite plan allowing 1000. Need to investigate misconfigured limiter.

title: Transaction History Gap
description: Finance cannot view deposits older than Jan 2024. API returns 500 with `missing ledger partition` message.

title: iOS Camera Upload
description: iOS 18 beta users report camera uploads freeze on ‘compressing photo’. Android unaffected.

title: Onboarding Survey Error
description: New customers cannot submit onboarding survey: clicking Finish shows `500 Internal Server Error`.

title: Two-Factor SMS Delay
description: SMS codes arrive after 5+ minutes for carriers in Canada; Twilio logs show delivery status `delayed`.

title: SAML Metadata Expired
description: Enterprise client’s SAML metadata expired yesterday, causing SSO failures. Need to refresh and notify customer.

title: Billing Address Validation
description: Checkout rejects valid Canadian postal codes (format A1A 1A1). Validation regex appears US-only.

title: Currency Rounding
description: Subscription prices in AUD show 2 decimal places but should show none (e.g., $99.00 AUD). Leads to confusion on invoices.

title: Webhook Signature Mismatch
description: Customers rotating their webhook secrets report signature mismatches until cache expires. Need manual cache flush endpoint.
